Transcribes audio to text with local models and auto-paste

Related repos

  • Speech-to-text tool using CTranslate2 for OpenAI Whisper model transcriptions
  • Transcribes audio and creates subtitles
  • Speech-to-text model for audio transcription, translation, and language detection
  • Converts files, performs OCR, and transcribes audio in a browser

  • Transcodes Audible files into mp3 or m4b
  • Text-to-audio model that generates speech and sounds from text
